content: description get ready to take on the world with the betty backpack this backpack uses s sturdy cording yarn to create the perfect mini backpack for all your adventures the main body of the backpack is worked flat all in one piece for easy stitching the front and back uses a beautiful stitch combo for amazing texture this pattern is free on my blog 1 this pattern is available as a lion brand kit 2 the kit comes with all the yarn you need to make your own backpack plus a free copy of the pdf digital download pattern you can even customize your yarn colors i have a full video tutorial available for the betty 3 check it out on my youtube channel 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-betty-backpack-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/3pqbr 3 https //youtu be/2smeknmhxyq
